answers.answer: There are many causes from a sign of glaucoma, ischemic optic neuropathy, diabetes, etc.  The bleeding is due to a rupture of a blood vessel and it can not be treated in most cases. There are treatments indicated if due to diabetes or other retinal vascular diseases.  It can lead to minimal or significant loss of vision depending on the cause.Dr. O.

question: Please inform me of the implications and significant symptoms arising from a bleeding optic nerve.How can a bleeding optic nerve be treated?This discussion is related to/posts/show/286804.
title: significance of bleeding optic nerve
